page.title: 17Ridgeway Hospital,Belper(3)
page.content: There are a few residents who stay in their flat all day but the rest go to the{Craft Area.}In the woodwork room they make bird houses and garden benches which they sell on Open Day. There is a laundry room where they sew buttons on clothes and put new zips in trousers.The {Occupational Therapy}is where the residents draw, paint,make stools,play drums or make lampshades. Outside there is a football pitch and one of the residents mows the lawns. The minibus takes residents on trips. -------------------------------------- Some of the houses on{Far Laund} are 70 or 80 years old and some date from the 1930's.There is a large housing estate built in the 1960's with{St.John's First School.}One of the houses on{Windmill Lane}used to be a windmill. Mr.Rice at{Pennock Hiron} delivers milk.The farm is 400 yrs.old.
